LoanApplicationProperty.name: LoanApplicationProperty
LoanApplicationProperty.description: Represents details of the property the loan application finances.

ExpMonthlyRentalIncome.description: Estimated gross monthly rental income per unit if application property is a two to four unit primary residence or investment property.

ExpNetMonthlyRentalInc.description: Estimated net monthly rental income per unit if application property is a two-to-four unit primary residence or investment property.

IsManufacturedHome.description: Indicates whether application property is a manufactured home.

IsMixedUseProperty.description: Indicates whether application property includes commercial space set aside for business use.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LoanApplicationId.description: Loan application associated with this property.

LoanPurposeType.description: What the borrower will use the loan for.

Name.description: Name of the loan application property.

PropertyAddress.description: Physical address of the property to be financed.

PropertyExtIdentifier.description: ID that uniquely identifies imported data in an external data source (if applicable). This field is unique within your organization.

PropertyGeocodeAccuracy.description: The level of accuracy of a location’s geographical coordinates compared with its physical address. A geocoding service typically provides this value based on the address’s latitude and longitude coordinates.

PropertyLatitude.description: Used with Longitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –90 and 90 with up to 15 decimal places.

PropertyLongitude.description: Used with Latitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. Acceptable values are numbers between –180 and 180 with up to 15 decimal places.

PropertyUseType.description: Borrower's stated use for the property.

PropertyValue.description: Estimated present market value of the application property.

RequestedLoanAmount.description: Total loan amount the borrower is applying for.

UnitsFinancedCount.description: Number of units being financed at this address.
